snippet.title: No Straight Roads - 8 Minutes of Gameplay
snippet.description: Check out some exclusive gameplay of No Straight Roads, a music and rhythm-focused action game from developer Metronomik (including Final Fantasy 15 lead game designer Wan Hazmer), debuted during IGN's Summer of Gaming.
